title: Oh Macromedia... I mean Adobe.
content: So, today I visit [Adobe's website](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215075752/http:/www.adobe.com/) to see what's new there. I was surprised to find [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215075752/http:/rosendorf.us/blogdorf/Images/macromediaType.jpg) in the banner on their front page. I'm referring to the <cite>days left</cite> number. Is this an anisotropic mishap, or am I missing something here?
author: theorosendorf

comments.content: Maybe the event will expand you knowledge of Adobe products? A stretch, I know. ;-)
